description: Workflow management system with state machine logic for approval processes, status transitions, and multi-step workflows
features: State machine: draft -> submitted -> under_review -> approved/rejected
Business rule: Cannot skip states (e.g., draft cannot go directly to approved)
Business rule: Only current approver can approve/reject
Business rule: Once rejected, can only transition back to draft
Business rule: Approved workflows cannot be edited
objectives: Test authorization rules (only current approver can act)
Ensure approval history is correctly recorded
